author: Peter Rudegeair
title: Mozido Founder Accused of Stealing Millions to Fund Luxurious Lifestyle
text:
Like so many startups, the financial-technology firm Mozido Inc. hyped its prospects in grand terms.
Mozido founder Michael Liberty in 2010 claimed that new products would generate billions of dollars of revenue and two years later said the company was worth over $100 billion, according to regulators. That year, regulators say, his partner also told investors “there is no risk,” and that committing more money was the “biggest no brainer in the history of the universe.”
...
